text.fm2: is a creative platform where customer wishes become works of art.
text.fm3: Our tattoo studio combines quality with high service and customer care. We offer you high quality original tattoos from masters whose work is serious and have years of experience
text.fm5: In addition to tattooing, our masters will help you choose your sketch and advise you completely FREE of charge.
text.fm6: We offer professional tattoo services in Warsaw, as well as laser tattoo removal, overlapping old tattoos, overlapping scars and stretch marks.
text.fm7: this is no ordinary tattoo studio.... Warsaw is full of great tattoo artists and for some reason they all work here.
text.fm8: Our studio gives great importance to keeping the studio clean, we only use disposable consumables and professional equipment.

firstOffer.text: Determining its origins is debatable, as the skin is completely biodegradable. However, it is thought that tattoos were already present on the Polynesian islands as early as 12000 BC ...
